item.title: Gobies
item.description: A species of ray-finned fish found in the Eastern Atlantic

item.title: Foxface
item.description: A species of fish found at reefs and lagoons in the tropical Western Pacific

item.title: Clownfish
item.description: Also known as percula clownfish and clown anemonefish

item.title: Pseudochrommis
item.description: a genus of fish in the family Pseudochromidae found in Indian and Pacific Ocean

item.title: Damselfish
item.description: The largest can grow up to 36 cm (14 in) long, but most species are much smaller

item.title: Filefish
item.description: A diverse family of tropical to subtropical tetraodontiform marine fish

item.title: Dragonets
item.description: Small, perciform, marine fish of the diverse family Callionymidae

item.title: Yellow tang
item.description: A saltwater fish species of the family Acanthuridae
